comment.author: 25767425@N02
comment._content: Are a lot of these prints thumb-tacked to a piece of cardboard and photographed by the LOC? Or was this done way earlier?

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: quigley_brown: Good question! This photograph is part of the George Grantham Bain Collection, which consists of the photographic files of the Bain News Service. (A brief collection description can be found here.) The Bain News Service sometimes collected photographs from other sources and made copy glass negatives of those images. The Library of Congress scanned the glass negatives produced by the Bain News Service and that is what you are seeing here.
